comment.author: 49511708@N00
comment._content: From the looks of them–especially their hats–I'd say that some of them were Australians, not English.

comment.author: 84914179@N00
comment._content: Interesting photo.  The slouch hats were typical of the uniforms belonging to ANZAC (Australia and New Zealand Army Corp) soldiers.  The woman volunteer may be American as the white sign shows the logo for the YWCA (Young Women's Christian Association) with the word "America" above.
